title: Organic Maca Root Supplement - Triple Blend Black, Red & Yellow Maca 1500mg | Energy, Stamina, Hormonal Balance & Libido Support | Enhanced with Black Pepper - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Maca Force - Premium Triple Maca Blend

Experience the full power of Peruvian Maca with Maca Force, featuring a potent 1500mg blend of organic Black, Red, and Yellow Maca Root. This comprehensive formula harnesses the unique benefits of all three maca varieties to support energy, stamina, hormonal balance, libido, and overall vitality. Enhanced with black pepper for optimal absorption.

Key Benefits

  • Enhanced Energy & Stamina: Natural energy boost without caffeine or stimulants
  • Hormonal Balance: Supports healthy hormone levels in both men and women
  • Libido & Sexual Health: Traditional aphrodisiac that supports healthy sexual function
  • Athletic Performance: Improves endurance, strength, and muscle building
  • Mood & Mental Clarity: Supports positive mood and reduces stress
  • Fertility Support: May support reproductive health in both genders
  • Adaptogenic Properties: Helps body adapt to physical and mental stress
  • Bone Health: Rich in calcium and minerals for strong bones

Triple Maca Blend - Why All Three Colors?

  • Black Maca (1000mg): Most potent variety for energy, stamina, mental focus, and male fertility. Supports muscle building and athletic performance
  • Red Maca (250mg): Best for hormonal balance, bone health, and prostate support. Supports mood and reduces stress
  • Yellow Maca (250mg): Most common variety, supports overall vitality, hormonal balance, and energy
  • Black Pepper (5mg): Enhances absorption and bioavailability of nutrients

What is Maca?

Maca is a Peruvian superfood root vegetable grown in the high Andes mountains. Used for thousands of years by indigenous peoples for energy, fertility, and vitality, maca is rich in:

  • Essential amino acids
  • Vitamins B, C, and E
  • Minerals: calcium, iron, zinc, magnesium
  • Beneficial plant compounds

Perfect For

  • Athletes and fitness enthusiasts
  • Those experiencing low energy or fatigue
  • Men and women seeking hormonal balance
  • Individuals looking to support libido
  • Anyone seeking natural vitality and wellness
  • Menopausal women seeking hormone support

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with meals. Best results with consistent use over 4-8 weeks.

Quality Assurance: 100% Organic Peruvian Maca. Vegetarian capsules. No fillers or artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Boost energy, stamina, and hormonal balance with Maca Force. Organic triple blend of Black (1000mg), Red, and Yellow Maca Root supports libido, athletic performance, and vitality. Enhanced with black pepper for absorption. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Organic Maca Root (Black) (Lepidium meyenii) 1000 mg **
Organic Maca Root (Red) (Lepidium meyenii) 250 mg **
Organic Maca Root (Yellow) (Lepidium meyenii) 250 mg **
Black Pepper (Piper Nigrum) (Fruit) 5 mg **

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Vegetable Stearate.
